Welcome to pyStatKs’s documentation!¶

pyStatKs is a statistics package to process NHL© game data. It uses the data scraper nhlscrapi to fetch the data and does some analysis using packages as pyBrain for neural networks and scipy and numpy for statistics.

pyStatKs in use:¶

I used the modules in a dataMining ipython sheet and a Neural Network ipython sheet. Modules are furthermore used in my R Jupyter notebooks.

Structure of pyStatKs¶

The pyStatKs module consists of two classes for data harvesting:

  • MinerC

the class fetching data using nhlscrapi

  • setupNhlDataC

class for formatting the data read

and classes for data processing and neural network analysis:

  • AnalysisC

as the base class for all the classes below.

  • NeuralNetworkAnalysisC

contains routines for the setup, training and analysis of neural networks

  • WaveletAnalysisC

contains routines for performing wavelet analysis on the dataset

  • BivariateAnalysisC

doing some bivariate data analysis

  • MultivariateStatisticsC

doing some multivariate statistics

KernelMapping(kernelName, team, gesamtDatenTyp)[source]¶

do a kernel mapping from KxN space to NxN space by applying various mapping functions to the input data

LinearKernelMapping(team, dataToAnalyze)[source]¶

the linear kernel mapping multiplies each dataset(row, with N features) with the transposed of the next set is zero if datasets are orthogonal (in the space spanned by the unit vectors of input space)

PlotDistanceMatrix2D()[source]¶

not really derived from AnalysisC, just lends some methods and shared data for all methods

AssessLastNGamesHelper(currentDate, currentSeason, Team, fullData, NLastGames)[source]¶

assess the performance of the team for the last N games starting from input id input season for team input Team input full dataset over all seasons input NLastGames: number of games to sum over (shifted sum) output number of team wins in last N performances

GetWinChanceHelper(homeGame)[source]¶
input:
list of 0 and 1, 1 for win, 0 for loss
output:
list with sums up to the list index
PrepareNNInputData(splitFactorTrainingTest)[source]¶

split input data into training and testing set :param splitFactorTrainingTest: ratio of splitting into training to testing dataset :return nothing, writes neural network input data fields internally into array

RunNeuralNetwork()[source]¶

setup the neural network input:

inputData:
pre-formatted data, with d-columns - we initialize as many input neurons as data columns
NhiddenLayers:
number of hidden (in between) layers of the neural network
NoHiddenNeuronsInNoInputLayers:
number of neurons in hidden layer as multiple of input neurons
output:
estimationOut
list of estimated outputs
actualOut
list of actual outputs as given in input
errorPercent
error of estimation in %
SetCurrentlyAnalyzedDataSetDict(typeString)[source]¶

as specified in input, read the input dataset from analysis class

SetupNNDataMatchup(Team1, Team2)[source]¶
input:
:param gesamtDatenDict
whole dataset for all seasons and stat categories
:param Team1Name
name of team1 of matchup
param Team2Name:
 name of team1 of matchup
output: returns interna fields for
_inputData

multivariate data with rows containing data for each matchup and columns containing categorical data as follows:

#1 first team home matchup score, until current matchup - add only information of one match at time #2 second team home matchup score (same as first team away matchup score), until current matchup #3 first teams performance over last N games #4 second teams performance over last N games #5 days off the first team had before matchup #6 days off the second team had before matchup
_outData
the target data, in this case a one dimensional array containing integer 1 if team1 won, else 0
SetupNeuralNetwork(NhiddenLayers, NoHiddenNeuronsInNoInputLayers)[source]¶

setup the feed forward neural network :param NhiddenLayers: number of hidden layers in the neural network :param NoHiddenNeuronsInNoInputLayers: number of neurons in a hidden layer :return: nothing, sets an internal field directing to the neural network
